titleStmt.title: Circumspect walking describing the seuerall rules, as so many seuerall steps in the way of wisedome. Gathered into this short manuell, by Tho. Taylor, preacher of Gods word at Aldermanbury Church in London.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Beale?] for Iames Boler, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Marigold,

notesStmt.note: Another edition of STC 23823.5, first published in 1619.
Pages 3-9 tightly bound, with some loss of print; some print faded and show-through; beginning-page 15 from Cambridge University Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Marigold
